    • Method Detail

      • initStreams

        public void initStreams​(java.net.Socket socket)
        This method initializes the data streams for network communications This method initializes the ObjectOutputStream and ObjectInputSteam used to pass data through the network
        Parameters:
        socket - : A socket from the current server connection

      • startListening

        public void startListening()
        This method starts the turn of the current object This method starts the current turn of an object by starting the thread that hold ois.readObject(). We use a new thread because this is a blocking call, and it would cause the GUI to freeze. We also use Platfrom.runLater() to send GUI update commands to the GUI, which is the data from the opponents turn.

      • listenForMap

        public void listenForMap()
        This method listens for a map from the server and sets the map accordingly

        Parameters:

        This method tells the client to start the round

        This method sends the client the random seed needed to create random enemies

        Returns:

      • addTower

        public void addTower​(Tower currTowerClicked,
                     double mouseX,
                     double mouseY)
        Method to add a tower to the game board. The location for the tower is dependent on where the user clicks in the gui, and the proper row and col are determined based on the click. The type of tower to be placed is also dependednt on what type of tower most recently clicked by the user
        Parameters:
        currTowerClicked - - the tower to be added to the tower map
        mouseX - - x coordinate of where the user clicked in the gui
        mouseY - - y coordinate of where the user clicked in the gui

      • sellTower

        public void sellTower​(double mouseX,
                      double mouseY)
        Method to sell the tower wherever the user clicks, as long as there is a tower at that position.
        Parameters:
        mouseX - - x coordinate of the user click
        mouseY - - y coordinate of the user click
